job.title: DRUID Software Engineer - Druid, SaaS, AWS
job.description: if you are a druid software engineer with experience please read on this role is with a rapidly growing stealth startup in santa clara currently there is a urgent need for a skilled software engineer with either druid data platform or flink infrastructure to rapidly scale their aws systems sorry more details can not be given until we speak by phone only candidates with this specific experience will be consideredltbrgtltbrgtwhat you need for this positionltbrgtltulgtltligt druidltligtltligt saasltligtltligt awsltligtltligt flinkltbrgtltligtltulgtso if you are a druid software engineer with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtemail your resume in word toltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtlooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtstephenmarodacybercoderscomltbrgtltulgtltligtplease do not change the email subject line in any way you must keep the jobid linkedin sm in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtstephen maroda lead recruiter cybercodersltbrgtltbrgtapplicants must be authorized to work in the usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcybercoders inc is proud to be an equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtall qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtyour right to workltstronggt in compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the united states and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
